captions.text:
Same place, same time
Eveything is the same

That place where
the memories were

The warmth left at 
the end of my hand
You are there, there
Your smell, your face

Please look at me,
look at me

Look at me
 I feel you like this
Feel you, feel you

I got the way you talk
with effort

I got your smile
with effort
I got you with effort

That area where 
we were together

That moment when 
we resembled each other

It was just good to
walk in the rain
You are gone, gone

How can I live alone
erasing you

That moment where 
we walked together

Those memories and
regrets we made together
Still there
I miss it too much

Please look at me,
look at me

Look at me
I still feel you
Feel you feel you

I got the way you talk
so difficulty

I got your smile
so difficulty

I resembled you
with difficulty
What's wrong?
Nothing
Say ah~

That area where 
we were together

That moment when 
we resembled each other

It was just good 
to walk in the rain
You are gone, gone

How can I live alone
erasing you
&nbsp;I miss you too much

I can't erase your name
that was allowed to me

My name called by you
Is still sleeping here

That place where 
we were together

At that time where we should
Be walking together

I still have to make it
Our future and my wishes

I'm still standing there
You are gone
JIN-Gone

comments.text:
Apparently from what I've gotten the "maestro" is her dad, that is her 
house and he teaches piano. and the ending when he is playing the piano he 
was playing a love song which if he didn't collapse would've ended in "I 
love you" and the dad who throughout the entire video knew that his student 
had a shorter lifespan because of his illness was trying to keep them apart 
so she wouldn't be sad when he died, he finished the song by playing "he 
loves you" which made her happy. Sorry if what I wrote gets confusing, I'm 
terribly at explaining﻿
